question.title: 344. Reverse String
question.description: Write a function that reverses a string. The input string is given as an array of characters s. You must do this by modifying the input array in-place with O(1) extra memory.
question.handlerFunction: e=>{try{let t=[["h","e","l","l","o"],["H","a","n","n","a","h"]],r=[["o","l","l","e","h"],["h","a","n","n","a","H"]];for(let n=0;n<t.length;n++){let i=[...t[n]];e(i),a().deepStrictEqual(i,r[n])}return!0}catch(e){throw console.log("reverseString handler function error"),Error(e)}}
